content: i knit socks from the toe up i knit sweaters from the top down and i knit hats from the bottom edge that didn t make sense to me and the decreases on most hats weren t round enough for my head leaving little scrunchy bits at the top i couldn t block out so i created this hat pattern you need about 75-100g of dk/light worsted weight yarn to complete this hat i ve used gorilla toes as it s superwash and machine-washable *updated to include the correct stitch count and instructions for row 5 *
